title: Reflective Instructional Design for Addressing Unplanned Challenging Topics

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary mathematics teaching competencies and classroom management experience
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for elementary mathematics teachers to effectively address unpredictable challenging topics during BYOD classroom instruction

learning_goals: Learners will immediately recognize and classify five types of unpredictable topics (related to students, professionalism, curriculum, community, and identity) that arise during class.
Learners will select and implement at least three optimal response strategies tailored to difficult situations using a reflective practice framework.
Learners will conduct systematic reflection on their teaching practices and derive improvement plans through case analysis with peer teachers.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
